trans-unit.source: Converts a typed message to an untyped message, or an untyped message to a typed message.
This class provides functionalities to convert a typed message to an untyped message, or an untyped message to a typed message.
A typed message is an instance of a type that has the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute> attribute annotated.
An untyped message is one that is an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> class.

You can annotate a type with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute> to create a custom message type, and then use the methods provided by this class to convert it to an untyped <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.TypedMessageConverter"></xref> class.
Represents a static method that returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.TypedMessageConverter"></xref> instance.
A message contract type that is a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> annotated with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute"></xref>.
An action string.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.TypedMessageConverter"></xref> instance.
Arguments are `null`
The specified message contract type does not have the MessageContractAttribute applied
Represents a static method that returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.TypedMessageConverter"></xref> instance.
A message contract type that is a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> annotated with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute"></xref>.
An action string.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute"></xref> that specifies the formatter to be used.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.TypedMessageConverter"></xref> instance.

The specified message contract type does not have the MessageContractAttribute applied

Creates a typed message from the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> instance.

This method takes an untyped [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] message, that is, an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>, and converts it into a typed message, that is, an instance of a type that is annotated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute>.
An untyped message.
An object that is a typed message.
Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> instance from the specified typed message.
A typed message.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> instance.
Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> instance from the specified typed message using the specified version.
A typed message.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion"></xref> that specifies the versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing associated with a message.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> instance.
